text: | birth_place =Patancheru, Telangana | residence = PATANCHERU hyderabad] | marital status =Married | Official Status = Politician | office = Member of Legislative Assembly | term = 2014 | spouse = gudem yadhamma | religion = | children = 2 sons and a daughter | constituency = Pantancheru | predecessor = | website = | footnotes = | date = | year = | source = | signature = }} Gudem Mahipal Reddy is the member of the legislative assembly representing Patancheru (Assembly constituency).Court case puts Patancheru MLA’ s future in jeopardy - The Hindu He belongs to Telangana Rashtra Samithi.
